title: Council Regulation (EC) No 2594/97 of 18 December 1997 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2731/75 fixing standard qualities for common wheat, rye, barley, maize, sorghum and durum wheat
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EC) No 2594/97 of 18 December 1997 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2731/75 fixing standard qualities for common wheat, rye, barley, maize, sorghum and durum wheat
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body:
The following shall be added to point (a) of Article 6 of Regulation (EEC) No 2731/75:
'however, for the purposes of the intervention buying-in of barley in Finland and Sweden, a derogation from the definition of shrivelled grains may be provided for in accordance with the procedure laid down in Article 23 of Regulation (EEC) No 1766/92;`.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following that of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 December 1997.
For the Council
The President
F. BODEN
(1) Opinion delivered on 16 December 1997 (not yet published in the Official Journal).
(2) OJ C 337, 7. 11. 1997, p. 51.
(3) OJ L 281, 29. 10. 1975, p. 22. Regulation as last amended by Regulation (EEC) 2054/93 (OJ L 187, 29. 7. 1993, p. 6).
